name: One Bit Plat
description:
This is my first project. A tiny little demo of a platformer I've been working on. Art by me, music and sound effects from mixkit.co/free-sound-effects

Instructions:

A and D - Move

W - Jump

Left click - Shoot

Right click (while moving) - Dash

Xbox controller support

Analog stick - Move

A - Jump

X - Shoot

R button - Dash
